overview:
Over the past decade, Juan has been focused on building online applications for some of the most recognized brands, helping them deliver outstanding user experiences. His passion for global cultures inspired him to write an award-winning blog (Global Culture), which has sparked many of the ideas currently under development at PlanetEye.

As VP, Technology, Juan is responsible for the companyâ€™s long-term online strategy as well as the day-to-day leadership of the technology team. Before joining PlanetEye, Juan was a senior manager with Blast Radius, where he helped create a variety of Web solutions for clients such as Aeroplan, BMW Canada, Electronic Arts and Virgin America.
